mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_cdInfo WHERE si LIKE CONCAT(#{array[0]},'%') AND (gu1 LIKE CONCAT(#{array[1]},'%') OR gu2 LIKE CONCAT(#{array[1]},'%')) ORDER BY hangCd DESC
SELECT * FROM tb_cdInfo WHERE si LIKE CONCAT(#{si},'%') AND gun LIKE CONCAT(#{gun},'%') AND (gu1 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{gu},'%') OR gu2 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{gu},'%')) ORDER BY hangCd DESC
SELECT * FROM tb_dataOffice WHERE platPlc LIKE CONCAT(#{addr},'%') AND bun = cast(#{bun} as unsigned) AND ji = cast(#{ji} as unsigned)
